info.author: Julius Osokinas
info.description:
================
django-stainless
================

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/django-stainless.svg
    :alt: PyPI Package
    :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-stainless

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/josokinas/django-stainless/master.svg
    :alt: Travis CI Build Status
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/josokinas/django-stainless

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/coveralls/josokinas/django-stainless/master.svg
    :alt: Coveralls Test Coverage
    :target: https://coveralls.io/r/josokinas/django-stainless

Features
========

- Supported Django versions: 1.7, 1.8
- Supported Python versions: 2.7, 3.3, 3.4

Installation
============

Install django-stainless:

.. code-block:: console

    pip install django-stainless

Add it to *settings.py* of your app:

.. code-block:: python

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
        ...
        'django_stainless'
    )

Usage
=====

Run **cleanmediafiles** command to remove all unused media files:

.. code-block:: console

    python manage.py cleanmediafiles

This will find all media files associated with FileField (and ImageField) of your models, that are not being used by any objects anymore.

To skip the confirmation of an action, use *--force* or simply *-f* option (useful when setting up a cron job).
